subject: Re: Order #SSN3422 confirmed
description_text:
Hello,

I made the payment to the link but accidentally did it on a different email
address, this is the order number from that email, Order #SSN3442.
Is this okay?

Thank you,
Wilfred

On Thu, Nov 13, 2025 at 2:50â€¯AM SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> Hello, I noticed you purchased 2 Haptics but did not include the power
> supply. These require a power supply to function. You can click this link
> to pay for the power supply and add a note.
> https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Wilfred Basaca,    No problem, we saw your note and have added the power supply to your order.
